character.description: Yveltal (イベルタル) is the mascot for the Y version and is an avian bird-like dual Dark/Flying type Pokémon designated the Destruction Pokémon and in flight, resembles the letter Y. Yveltal`s signature attack is Oblivion Wing, where it flies into the air and releases a blast of deadly energy; its special ability Dark Aura raises Dark-type moves. Pocket Monsters XY: Hakai no Mayu to Diancie Yveltal is the Pokémon that once caused the "Great Destruction", which annihilated all life in the Kalos region. It is known as the "Destruction Pokémon" and is said to steal all life away. After it destroyed everything, Yveltal turned into a "Cocoon of Destruction", in which form it still sleeps today. Yveltal was reawakened when the bandits disturbed it and it began to cause havoc in the Alearth Woods once again. Xerneas intervened and Yveltal was driven off.

character.name: Onbat
character.description: Noibat (オンバット) is the child form of Noivern. Its ears produce ultrasonic waves that allow it to communicate with others and hunt its prey. It can even use the waves to determine if fruit is ripe enough to eat.

character.name: Xerneas
character.description: Xerneas is a Fairy-type Legendary Pokémon introduced in Generation VI. It is not known to evolve into or from any other Pokémon. Along with Chespin, Fennekin, Froakie, and Yveltal, it was the first Generation VI Pokémon to be revealed to the public on January 8, 2013 as part of the Pokémon Direct broadcast. Xerneas is the game mascot of Pokémon X, appearing on the boxart. It is a member of the aura trio with Yveltal and Zygarde. Xerneas is a quadruped, stag-like Pokémon with four pairs of antlers. Its coloration varies slightly depending on which mode it is in: Active Mode or Neutral Mode. Regardless of mode, its main body is always black with a blue stripe down its back and a short, bushy tail. Starting at its knees there is a blade-like trim around each leg, which forms a point under each hoof. There is an upside-down, V-shaped marking on its chest in the same color as the trim on its legs. Its head and neck are blue, and there are two large, tufts that extend onto its chest and curve upward. Its first pair of antlers extends onto its head and curves around the underside of its eyes. The eyes are black with X-shaped pupils. There is a short marking on top of its snout and an upward curving horn on each side of its head in place of ears. In Active Mode, its markings, antlers, and the trim on its legs is pale gold. Its antlers have branches and bumps in many colors and there are multicolored spots on its back. In Neutral Mode, its marking and antlers are instead pale blue and the embellishments on its antlers and spots on its back are a darker blue. Xerneas has the power to share eternal life. This occurs when the horns on its head shine in seven colors. As seen in the anime, if it expends too much life energy it transforms into a tree and sleeps for 1,000 years. Xerneas is the only known Pokémon capable of learning the move Geomancy.

character.name: Oarot
character.description: Trevenant (オーロット) is a tree-like Pokémon possessing multiple root-like legs and one eye that was first briefly featured in a commercial for Pokémon X and Y shown at screenings of ExtremeSpeed Genesect: Mewtwo Awakens in Japan, which was later shown on the eShop and uploaded to Pokémon Japan`s official YouTube channel.

character.name: Serena
character.description: Serena is a young girl who is just starting on her journey as a Pokémon trainer in the Kalos region. She appears to have met http://anidb.net/ch6693 [Satoshi] before.

character.name: Eureka
character.description: Eureka is Citron`s younger sister. She met Ash in Niare City and she and her brother were his very first battle opponents in the Kalos region, a battle he won`t forget soon. Eureka is a girl of strong character, who`s always searching for a future wife for her brother. Since she`s not a Pokémon Trainer yet, but she gets Citron to "keep" Pokémon for her. She was confirmed to be in the XY anime in Smash #153. Eureka`s Japanese name origin is from the lily family which is "Yuri-ka" in Japanese

character.name: Citron
character.description: Citron is Eureka`s older brother. He met Ash in Niare City and he and his sister were his very first battle opponents in the Kalos region, a battle he won`t forget soon. He`s a great inventor, a gym leader and carries his pride and joy, the "Eipam Arm" in his backpack. Eureka is always searching for a future wife for her brother. Since she`s not a Pokémon Trainer, she gets Citron to "keep" Pokémon for her. Citron was confirmed to be in the XY anime in Smash #153. His Japanese name is based off of the fragrant citrus fruit with the same name.

character.name: Keromatsu (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Froakie contacted Professor Sycamore laboratory to let them know he wanted to give up Froakie. The staff at the lab had been worried about Froakie. This particular Froakie is a bit different to the other ones the professor had given out. It refused to listen to its trainers during battle, it ran away from a trainer simply because it didn`t like its trainer and several trainers have returned it to Professor Sycamore lab. Froakie though took a liking to Ash and it came to the rescue when Team Rocket was trying to steal Pikachu. It also accompanied Ash up the Prism Tower when they went after Garchomp. Finally, as Ash was leaving the lab, Froakie appeared with its Poké Ball, indicating that it wanted to travel with him. Ash agreed and he caught Froakie.

character.name: Dedenne (Citron)
character.description: Clemont`s Dedenne appeared in a forest outside of Lumiose City. As soon as Bonnie saw it she thought it was cute and wanted to keep it but because she wasn`t a Pokémon Trainer, she tried to convince her brother to capture it for her. Bonnie noted that it wasn`t afraid of humans and it got along with Pikachu quickly since they`re both Electric types and they communicated with electricity. Clemont initial attempt to capture it was not successful though. A few days later though, the same Dedenne reappeared as it had been following them the whole time they had been traveling. This time though Clemont was successful in capturing it. It really seems to like the Pokémon food that Clemont and Bonnie give it.

character.name: Horubee (Citron)
character.description: Clemont`s Bunnelby battled against Pikachu in its very first battle as Clemont as its trainer. He told it to just relax and it would do great. Their battle was cut short as Team Rocket interfered.

character.name: Fokko (Serena)
character.description: Serena`s Fennekin was the Pokémon that Serena chose as her starter Pokémon at Professor Sycamore lab. Serena thought that after seeing all the starter Pokémon for real that they were all cute but she had already decided before she left home that she would get a Fennekin.

character.name: Harimaron (Citron)
character.description: Clemont`s Chespin was initially one of the three Pokémon a Trainer receives from Professor Sycamore when they start out on their journey. It took the basket of macarons that Serena had baked the night before and began stuffing itself and didn`t want to share them. Sophie noted that Harimaron loves pranks. Team Rocket captured Professor Sycamore, Serena and Bonnie but Harimaron was able to follow a macaron crumb trail to their hideout. It was initially more concerned about getting the macarons back but it finally realized that Team Rocket was also a threat, so it helped out and manged to stop the Mega Mega Nyarth mecha. During its time with Clemont in the crisis situation, the two began to bond and just as Clemont was leaving Professor Sycamore lab, it indicated that it wanted to travel with Clemont. Professor Sycamore gave Clemont Harimaron`s monster ball and he got it.

character.name: Diancie
character.description: Diancie can create diamonds out of thin air by compressing the carbon in the atmosphere with its hands. It uses these jewels in battle to attack enemies and protect itself. Groups of Carbink tend to gather around Diancie, but Diancie pays them little heed and acts only according to its own will. Pocket Monsters XY: Hakai no Mayu to Diancie Diancie is the princess of Diamond Ore Country. In order to gain the power to create a "Sacred Diamond", the Diamond Ore Country`s energy source, she has set out on a journey to find Xerneas. Diancie can Mega Evolve into Mega Diancie after it created a Diancite. On her journey, she befriended Ash Ketchum and his friends who helped her get away from the bandits that were seeking to capture her to make diamonds for them. They traveled with her in order to find Xerneas and became friends forever after their experiences together. Once Diancie met Xerneas, it already knew why Diancie was there and granted her that wish. Xerneas used its Fairy Aura on Diancie so it would let it unleash its true power and create a Sacred Diamond. Having completed her journey and learned to Mega Evolve, Diancie was able to save the Diamond Ore Country by creating a new "Sacred Diamond" to replace the old one that had died out.

character.name: Ayaka
character.description: Ayaka is an experienced Pokémon Trainer who was first seen traveling through the Kalos region. She battled Alan in a 1-on-1 Mega Evolution battle in the forest but after a fierce battle she ended up loosing the fight.

character.name: Absol (Ayaka)
character.description: Ayaka`s Absol appears to be Ayaka`s main Pokémon. It can Mega Evolve into Mega Absol. Ayaka`s Absol battled against Alan`s Charizard in a 1-on-1 Mega Evolution battle in a forest in Kalos but after a fierce battle Ayaka`s Absol ended up loosing the fight and Alan`s Charizard won.

character.name: Marilyn Flame
character.description: Marilyn Flame is a beautiful female thief that was trying to capture Diancie. Ninja Riot didn`t think she was a trendy bandit and called her a talkative bandit. She ended up getting turned to stone with Ninja Riot by Yveltal but was later healed by Xerneas. In the movie credits, she is seen being proposed to Ninja Riot.

character.name: Ninja Riot
character.description: Ninja Riot is a ninja thief hiding his face with a mask who tried to capture Diancie. He ended up getting turned to stone with Marilyn Flame by Yveltal but was later healed by Xerneas. In the movie credits, he is seen proposing to Marilyn Flame.

character.name: Algus Steel
character.description: Algus Steel is a famous Pokémon bandit that was attempting to catch Diancie in order for it to make diamonds for him. His daughter is Miriss Steel. He owned a large flying ship that could partially cloak but it was destroyed by Yveltal during a battle and it crashed into a lake. He loves chocolates and had ordered some all the way from the Houen region. He is big in stature and his daughter worries about his health by eating too many chocolate. In the movie credits, he and his daughter are seen running a chocolate shop.

character.name: Miriss Steel
character.description: Miriss Steel is a famous Pokémon bandit that was attempting to catch Diancie in order for it to make diamonds for her. Her father is Algus Steel. She worries about her fathers health as he eats too many chocolate. She pretended to be looking out for Diancie when she rescued her from Team Rocket but she had been spying on Diancie to know when the right time was to attempt to capture it. In the movie credits, she and her father are seen running a chocolate shop.

character.name: Carne
character.description: Diantha is the strongest Pokémon Trainer in the Kalos region and is also the Champion of the Elite Four. As a famous actress, she is know for her elegant, full of mature composure and according to Serena, she is just the perfect woman in every aspect. Her character is based off of the real world actress Audrey Hepburn. Her movie "My Sweet Lady" (マイスイーツ・レディ) was the current blockbuster when Ash Ketchum was in the Kalos region. The movie title is a nod to the Audrey Hepburn movie My Fair Lady. Serena considers Diantha to be her idol. Professor Sycamore has been trying to get Diantha`s Key Stone so he can study it but she has respectfully declined his requests on numerous occasions. While doing location shooting in a region, Diantha makes sure she tries the sweets that are famous there, no matter how busy she is. When Serena got the last gâteau au chocolat slice, she decided to share it with Diantha who was in disguise. She usually declines private matches with Trainers, but since Ash Ketchum and his friends shared the cake with her, she made an exception and battled against him. The match was left undecided as it was interrupted by Rocket Gang. Ash Ketchum vowed to battle her again when he won the Kalos League.

character.name: Sirknight (Carne)
character.description: Diantha`s Gardevoir is Diantha main partner. The two share a close bond and are able to communicate during battles without speaking. It can Mega Evolve into Mega Gardevoir during battle. While at the Guipna Highlands for a shooting a movie, a thick fog arrived and Diantha got lost in it. Diantha`s Gardevoir apparently came out of the monster ball she left with her manager and came looking for her, leading the way for everyone. During its exhibition match against Morgan`s Absol, it was quickly able to dodge all the moves and defeat it quite easily.

character.name: Luchabull (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Hawlucha was revealed in the 2nd opening and 2nd ending of the XY anime in Japan.

character.name: Hinoyakoma (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Fletchinder was revealed in the 2nd opening and 2nd ending of the XY anime in Japan. Ash`s Fletchling evolved into Ash`s Fletchinder during a battle against Nami`s Talonflame. Evolving into Fletchinder Nami challenged Ash Ketchum to a sky battle and initially chose Ash`s Fletchling to battle her but Nami`s Talonflame thought it was too weak to battle against and wanted to battle Ash`s Hawlucha instead. Ash Ketchum made a deal with her that if Ash`s Hawlucha defeated her Fiarrow, that Ash`s Fletchling could battle it also. Nami ended up winning that match and Ash`s Hawlucha was defeated. Not long after though, Nami`s Talonflame was captured by Rocket Gang and with the assistance of Ash`s Fletchling, it was set free. Nami`s Talonflame wanted to battle Ash`s Fletchling after the events of Rocket Gang`s interference proved to it that Ash`s Fletchling was a strong opponent despite its initial impression. Nami`s Talonflame ended up being defeated after Ash`s Fletchling evolved into Ash`s Fletchinder during the battle.

character.name: Ganpi
character.description: Ganpi was seen battling against Diantha in a large stadium with many spectators. The battle was obviously very important but little details are known other than the fact that he ended up loosing the battle.

character.name: Hassam (Ganpi)
character.description: Ganpi`s Scizor battled against Diantha`s Gardevoir in a significant battle in a large stadium but little details about the nature of the actual battle are known. It has been seen Mega Evolving into Mega Scizor where it lost the battle against Diantha`s Gardevoir. None of its moves are confirmed as there was no dialog during that scene.

character.name: Di
character.description: Di is the elder of Diamond Ore Country. He personally witnessed the "Great Destruction" and was saved by Xerneas when Yveltal was destroying the Alearth Woods. It sent Diancie out on a journey to find Xerneas so it could use Fairy Aura on Diancie so it would let it unleash its true power and create a Sacred Diamond.

character.name: Brigarron (Miriss Steel)
character.description: Miriss Steel`s Chesnaught is Miriss` only confirmed known Pokémon. Its large size makes it a formidable opponent. It was used to try to capture Diancie but it got turned to stone after an encounter with Yveltal. It was later healed by Xerneas` Fairy Aura.

character.name: Hitotsuki (Algus Steel)
character.description: Algus Steel`s Honedge was instructed to spy on Diancie to find a good time to attempt to capture it. It was also tasked with actually capturing it but ended up getting turned into stone after Yveltal attacked it. It was later healed by Xerneas` Fairy Aura.

character.name: Nidangill (Algus Steel)
character.description: Algus Steel`s Doublade was used by Miriss Steel to ride on when she left the airship. It was also tasked with capturing Diancie but ended up getting turned into stone after Yveltal attacked it. It was later healed by Xerneas` Fairy Aura. None of its moves were confirmed in the movie dialog.

character.name: Gillgard (Algus Steel)
character.description: Algus Steel`s Aegislash was used by Algus to ride on when he left the airship. It was also tasked with capturing Diancie. None of its moves were confirmed in the movie dialog.

character.name: Tekkanin (Ninja Riot)
character.description: Ninja Riot has two Ninjask and are mainly used in tandem with a cable attached to allow him to fly in the air. None of their moves were confirmed in the movie dialog.

character.name: Mafoxy (Marilyn Flame)
character.description: Marilyn Flame`s Delphox is Marilyn Flame`s only known Pokémon. It was used in order to try to catch Diancie. It was turned to stone by Yveltal but later healed by Xerneas`s Fairy Aura.

character.name: Gekkouga (Ninja Riot)
character.description: Ninja Riot`s Greninja is Ninja Riot main Pokémon and was used to try to capture Diancie. It confronted Ash Ketchum and his friends a couple of times. It was turned to stone by Yveltal but later healed by Xerneas`s Fairy Aura.

character.name: Majima
character.description: Majima is the leader of the Diamond Ore Country`s butlers that serve Diancie. He and the other butlers accompanied her on her journey and tried to protect and look out for her.

character.name: Nite
character.description: Nite is one of the Diamond Ore Country`s butlers that serve Diancie. He and the other butlers accompanied Diancie on her journey and tried to protect and look out for her.

character.name: Joke
character.description: Joke is one of the Diamond Ore Country`s butlers that serve Diancie. He and the other butlers accompanied Diancie on her journey and tried to protect and look out for her.

character.name: Kaenjishi (Ayaka)
character.description: Ayaka`s Pyroar battled against Pikachu outside the castle in Avugnon Town near the Diamond Country. It lost the battle to Pikachu after it couldn`t endure a Electro Ball. None of its moves can be confirmed due to the lack of dialog during this scene.

character.name: Nyaonix (Ayaka)
character.description: Ayaka`s Meowstic battled against Ash`s Froakie outside the castle in Avugnon Town near the Diamond Country. It was the second matchup in a 3 on 3 battle. Ayaka`s Meowstic won the battle and defeated Ash`s Froakie. None of its moves can be confirmed due to the lack of dialog during this scene.

character.name: Uschi
character.description: Uschi is a hotel porter who looks exactly like his voice actor, Atsuto Uchida. The character is named "Uschi", after the nickname Uchida was given in Germany as a soccer player. He is briefly seen in the mall where he gets run into by Ash Ketchum and drops his parcels.

character.name: Pikachu (Uschi)
character.description: Uschi`s Pikachu briefly seen in the mall scene sitting on Uschi`s right shoulder when it gets run into by Ash Ketchum and Uschi drops his parcels.
